position: Major in EE || Minor in CSE || Micro Specialization in AI || IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Redesigned an eCommerce app using ReactJS to deliver faster, more responsive, and dynamic content. Optimized performance for better load times and user experience while collaborating with UI/UX teams to implement user-focused features. Developed a dedicated section for pre-owned items and ensured security by managing dependencies and addressing vulnerabilities.
